headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Authorized access token. For details, see Authentication .

parameters.name: advertiser_id Conditional
parameters.description: Either advertiser_id or library_id has to be set. To get pages under an ad account, you must specify the advertiser ID.

parameters.name: library_id Conditional
parameters.description: Either advertiser_id or library_id has to be set. To get pages under a Business Center, you must specify the ID of the form library that contains the page and leads. You can migrate pages and leads from an ad account to a Business Center.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Current number of pages. Default value: 1. Value range: â‰¥ 1.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Page size. Default value: 10. Value range: 1-100.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Page status. Enum values: EDITED (draft), PUBLISHED (ready).

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: Page title. This field will be used to filter the page that contains the words in the title.

parameters.name: update_time_range
parameters.description: Filter for pages updated in the specified time range.

parameters.name: start Conditional
parameters.description: Required when update_time_range is passed. Start time in the format of YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS (UTC time). Example: 2024-01-01 00:00:00 .

parameters.name: end Conditional
parameters.description: Required when update_time_range is passed. End time in the format of YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS (UTC time). Example: 2024-01-01 00:00:00 .

parameters.name: business_type
parameters.description: Page type. Enum values: LEAD_GEN (Instant Form), STORE_FRONT (Storefront Page), APP_PROFILE_PAGE (App Profile Page), TIKTOK_INSTANT_PAGE (Custom Page or Custom TikTok Instant Page), SHOP_ADS_PLP (Shop Ads Product List Page), SHOP_ADS_PDP (Shop Ads Product Detail Page), POP_UP_FORM (Direct Message Page). Default value: LEAD_GEN .

parameters.name: business_types
parameters.description: Page types. Enum values: LEAD_GEN (Instant Form), STORE_FRONT (Storefront Page), APP_PROFILE_PAGE (App Profile Page), TIKTOK_INSTANT_PAGE (Custom Page or Custom TikTok Instant Page), SHOP_ADS_PLP (Shop Ads Product List Page), SHOP_ADS_PDP (Shop Ads Product Detail Page), POP_UP_FORM (Direct Message Page). Note : If it is passed concurrently with business_type , the value of business_type will be ignored.

fields.name: list
fields.description: Page list.

fields.name: page_id
fields.description: Page ID.

fields.name: status
fields.description: Page status. Enum values: EDITED (draft), PUBLISHED (ready).

fields.name: create_time
fields.description: The creation time of the page in the format of YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS (UTC time). Example: 2024-01-01 00:00:00 .

fields.name: update_time
fields.description: The time the page was last updated in the format of YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS (UTC time). Example: 2024-01-01 00:00:00 .

fields.name: publish_time
fields.description: The publishing time of the page in the format of YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS (UTC time). Example: 2024-01-01 00:00:00 .

fields.name: title
fields.description: Title.

fields.name: preview_url
fields.description: Preview link of the page. The link is generated after the page is ready, and will be empty when the page is only a draft.

fields.name: thumbnail
fields.description: Page preview thumbnail image.

fields.name: app_id
fields.description: Returned for all App Profile Pages and TikTok Instant Pages where an App is specified. The ID of the App that is specified in the page. To filter App Profile Pages, set business_type to APP_PROFILE_PAGE or set business_types to ["APP_PROFILE_PAGE"] in the request.

fields.name: has_cpp
fields.description: Returned only for TikTok Instant Pages. Whether the TikTok Instant Page contains Custom Product Page . Enum values: true , false . To filter TikTok Instant Pages, set business_type to TIKTOK_INSTANT_PAGE or set business_types to ["TIKTOK_INSTANT_PAGE"] in the request.

fields.name: destination_urls
fields.description: Returned when your business_type is LEAD_GEN (Instant Form), APP_PROFILE_PAGE (App Profile Page), or TIKTOK_INSTANT_PAGE (Custom Page or Custom TikTok Instant Page). Destination URLs.

fields.name: messaging_app_type
fields.description: The type of instant messaging app associated with the TikTok Instant Page. Enum values: MESSENGER : Messenger. WHATSAPP : WhatsApp. IM_URL : No instant messaging app is associated with the TikTok Instant Page.

fields.name: messaging_app_account_id
fields.description: The ID of the instant messaging app account associated with the TikTok Instant Page. When messaging_app_type is MESSENGER , this field represents the Facebook Page ID. When messaging_app_type is WHATSAPP , this field represents the WhatsApp phone number. When messaging_app_type is IM_URL , this field will be an empty string ( "" ).

fields.name: transfer_status
fields.description: Whether the page has been transferred to Business Center. Enum values: UNSET , TRANSFERRED

fields.name: template_id
fields.description: Page template ID.

fields.name: user_id
fields.description: ID of the user who created the page.

fields.name: is_associated
fields.description: Whether Storefront Page has been associated with some ad (Storefront Page cannot be reused, and each page can only be associated with one ad).

fields.name: duplicate_id
fields.description: Duplicate source page ID.

fields.name: page_info
fields.description: Pagination information.

fields.name: page
fields.description: Current page.

fields.name: page_size
fields.description: Page size.

fields.name: total_number
fields.description: Total number of results.

fields.name: total_page
fields.description: Total number of pages.

fields.name: request_id
fields.description: Log id of the request, uniquely identifying a request.
